meanings.definition: Acting to prevent or deter burglary.
meanings.sent1: Installing an antiburglary alarm system can help keep your home safe.
meanings.sent2: The antiburglary lock on the door provided extra security for the house.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky raccoon tried to break in, but the antiburglary lights scared it away.
meanings.sent4: Her vigilance was like an antiburglary shield, protecting her belongings from theft.
meanings.sent5: The neighborhood watch program was an antiburglary force to be reckoned with.

meanings.sent1: The new antiburglary windows were sturdy and difficult to break.
meanings.sent2: The antiburglary safe kept their valuables secure from thieves.
meanings.sent3: The cat's collar was like an antiburglary device, ensuring no one could steal its food.
meanings.sent4: The fortress-like walls of the castle were an antiburglary measure against invaders.
meanings.sent5: The antiburglary gate was a formidable barrier to anyone attempting unauthorized entry.
